abstract: A Madoff brother pleaded guilty and the British took Barclays to task. JPMorgan’s trade loss could reach $9 billion. News Corporation planned a split, and Microsoft acquired a social network. A look back on our reporting of last week’s news in finance.
snippet: A Madoff brother pleaded guilty and the British took Barclays to task. JPMorgan’s trade loss could reach $9 billion. News Corporation planned a split, and Microsoft acquired a social network. A look back on our reporting of last week’s news in fin...
lead_paragraph: A Madoff brother pleaded guilty, and the British took Barclays to task. JPMorgan’s trade loss could reach $9 billion. News Corporation planned a split, and Microsoft acquired a social network. A look back on our reporting of last week’s news in finance.

headline.main: DealBook’s Week in Review: Calls for Regulations and Resignations
